title: BIG FACTS feat. Glen "Big Baby" Davis
itunes:title: BIG FACTS feat. Glen "Big Baby" Davis
description:
Teamwork, bad teammates and winning are the focus of discussion this week on BIG FACTS. Former NBA star Glen "Big Baby" Davis joins the squad to talk about his marijuana charge in Maryland, athletes who smoke weed, which basketball players can and cant rap, favorite NBA memories and more!

Visit

www.bigfactspod.com

www.twitter.com/bigfactspod
